00054 // Defines 4 optimized inlined function called in Champ_implementation_P1.cpp by the 2 previous coord_barycentrique_P1 functions:
00055 // coord_barycentrique_P1_triangle
00056 // coord_barycentrique_P1_rectangle
00057 // coord_barycentrique_P1_tetraedre
00058 // coord_barycentrique_P1_hexaedre
00059 inline double coord_barycentrique_P1_triangle(const IntTab& polys,
00060                                               const DoubleTab& coord,
00061                                               double x, double y, int le_poly, int i)
00062 {
00063   assert(polys.dimension(1)==3);
00064   int som0 ,som1,som2;
00065   switch(i)
00066     {
00067     case 0 :
00068       {
00069         som0=polys(le_poly , 0);
00070         som1=polys(le_poly , 1);
00071         som2=polys(le_poly , 2);
00072         break;
00073       }
00074     case 1 :
00075       {
00076         som0=polys(le_poly , 1);
00077         som1=polys(le_poly , 2);
00078         som2=polys(le_poly , 0);
00079         break;
00080       }
00081     case 2 :
00082       {
00083         som0=polys(le_poly , 2);
00084         som1=polys(le_poly , 0);
00085         som2=polys(le_poly , 1);
00086         break;
00087       }
00088     default :
00089       {
00090         som0=-1;
00091         som1=-1;
00092         som2=-1;
00093         Cerr << "A triangle does not have " << i << " nodes in Champ_P1::coord_barycentrique." << finl;
00094         Process::exit();
00095       }
00096     }
00097   double den = (coord(som2,0)-coord(som1,0))*(coord(som0,1)-coord(som1,1))
00098                - (coord(som2,1)-coord(som1,1))*(coord(som0,0)-coord(som1,0));
00099 
00100   double num = (coord(som2,0)-coord(som1,0))*(y-coord(som1,1))
00101                - (coord(som2,1)-coord(som1,1))*(x-coord(som1,0));
00102 
00103   assert (den != 0.);
00104   double coord_bary=num/den;
00105 #ifndef NDEBUG
00106   if ((coord_bary < -Objet_U::precision_geom) || (coord_bary > 1.+Objet_U::precision_geom))
00107     {
00108       Cerr << "WARNING: The barycentric coordinate of point :" << finl;
00109       Cerr << "x= " << x << " y=" << y << finl;
00110       Cerr << "is not between 0 and 1 : " << coord_bary << finl;
00111       Cerr << "On the element " << le_poly << " of the processor " << Process::me() << finl;
00112     }
00113 #endif
00114   return coord_bary;
00115 }
00116 
00117 inline double coord_barycentrique_P1_rectangle(const IntTab& polys,
00118                                                const DoubleTab& coord,
00119                                                double x, double y, int le_poly, int i)
00120 {
00121   assert(polys.dimension(1)==4);
00122   double alpha_x, alpha_y;
00123   switch(i)
00124     {
00125     case 0 :
00126       {
00127         alpha_x = -1.;
00128         alpha_y = -1;
00129         break;
00130       }
00131     case 1 :
00132       {
00133         alpha_x = 1.;
00134         alpha_y = -1.;
00135         break;
00136       }
00137     case 2 :
00138       {
00139         alpha_x = -1.;
00140         alpha_y = 1.;
00141         break;
00142       }
00143     case 3 :
00144       {
00145         alpha_x = 1.;
00146         alpha_y = 1.;
00147         break;
00148       }
00149     default :
00150       {
00151         alpha_x = 0;
00152         alpha_y = 0;
00153         Cerr << "Error in Champ_P1::coord_barycentrique : " << finl;
00154         Process::exit();
00155       }
00156     }
00157 
00158   int som0=polys(le_poly , 0);
00159   int som1=polys(le_poly , 1);
00160   int som2=polys(le_poly , 2);
00161   double delta_x = coord(som1,0)-coord(som0,0);
00162   double delta_y = coord(som2,1)-coord(som0,1);
00163   double x0 = coord(som0,0)+delta_x/2.;
00164   double y0 = coord(som0,1)+delta_y/2.;
00165   double coord_bary = 0.25*(1.+2.*alpha_x*(x-x0)/delta_x)*(1.+2.*alpha_y*(y-y0)/delta_y);
00166 #ifndef NDEBUG
00167   if ((coord_bary < -Objet_U::precision_geom) || (coord_bary > 1.+Objet_U::precision_geom))
00168     {
00169       Cerr << "WARNING: The barycentric coordinate of point :" << finl;
00170       Cerr << "x= " << x << " y=" << y << finl;
00171       Cerr << "is not between 0 and 1 : " << coord_bary << finl;
00172       Cerr << "On the element " << le_poly << " of the processor " << Process::me() << finl;
00173     }
00174 #endif
00175   return coord_bary;
00176 }
00177 
00178 inline double coord_barycentrique_P1_tetraedre(const IntTab& polys,
00179                                                const DoubleTab& coord,
00180                                                double x, double y, double z,
00181                                                int le_poly, int i)
00182 {
00183   int som0,som1,som2,som3;
00184   assert(polys.dimension(1)==4);
00185   switch(i)
00186     {
00187     case 0 :
00188       {
00189         som0=polys(le_poly , 0);
00190         som1=polys(le_poly , 1);
00191         som2=polys(le_poly , 2);
00192         som3=polys(le_poly , 3);
00193         break;
00194       }
00195     case 1 :
00196       {
00197         som0=polys(le_poly , 1);
00198         som1=polys(le_poly , 2);
00199         som2=polys(le_poly , 3);
00200         som3=polys(le_poly , 0);
00201         break;
00202       }
00203     case 2 :
00204       {
00205         som0=polys(le_poly , 2);
00206         som1=polys(le_poly , 3);
00207         som2=polys(le_poly , 0);
00208         som3=polys(le_poly , 1);
00209         break;
00210       }
00211     case 3 :
00212       {
00213         som0=polys(le_poly , 3);
00214         som1=polys(le_poly , 0);
00215         som2=polys(le_poly , 1);
00216         som3=polys(le_poly , 2);
00217         break;
00218       }
00219     default :
00220       {
00221         som0=-1;
00222         som1=-1;
00223         som2=-1;
00224         som3=-1;
00225         Cerr << "Error in Champ_P1::coord_barycentrique : " << finl;
00226         Cerr << "A tetrahedron does not have " << i << "nodes " << finl;
00227         Process::exit();
00228       }
00229     }
00230 
00231   double xp = (coord(som2,1)-coord(som1,1))*(coord(som0,2)-coord(som1,2))
00232               - (coord(som2,2)-coord(som1,2))*(coord(som0,1)-coord(som1,1));
00233   double yp = (coord(som2,2)-coord(som1,2))*(coord(som0,0)-coord(som1,0))
00234               - (coord(som2,0)-coord(som1,0))*(coord(som0,2)-coord(som1,2));
00235   double zp = (coord(som2,0)-coord(som1,0))*(coord(som0,1)-coord(som1,1))
00236               - (coord(som2,1)-coord(som1,1))*(coord(som0,0)-coord(som1,0));
00237   double den = xp * (coord(som3,0)-coord(som1,0))
00238                + yp * (coord(som3,1)-coord(som1,1))
00239                + zp * (coord(som3,2)-coord(som1,2));
00240 
00241   xp = (coord(som2,1)-coord(som1,1))*(z-coord(som1,2))
00242        - (coord(som2,2)-coord(som1,2))*(y-coord(som1,1));
00243   yp = (coord(som2,2)-coord(som1,2))*(x-coord(som1,0))
00244        - (coord(som2,0)-coord(som1,0))*(z-coord(som1,2));
00245   zp = (coord(som2,0)-coord(som1,0))*(y-coord(som1,1))
00246        - (coord(som2,1)-coord(som1,1))*(x-coord(som1,0));
00247   double num = xp * (coord(som3,0)-coord(som1,0))
00248                + yp * (coord(som3,1)-coord(som1,1))
00249                + zp * (coord(som3,2)-coord(som1,2));
00250 
00251   assert (den != 0.);
00252   double coord_bary = num/den;
00253 #ifndef NDEBUG
00254   if ((coord_bary < -Objet_U::precision_geom) || (coord_bary > 1.+Objet_U::precision_geom))
00255     {
00256       Cerr << "WARNING: The barycentric coordinate of point :" << finl;
00257       Cerr << "x= " << x << " y=" << y << " z=" << z << finl;
00258       Cerr << "is not between 0 and 1 : " << coord_bary << finl;
00259       Cerr << "On the element " << le_poly << " of the processor " << Process::me() << finl;
00260     }
00261 #endif
00262   return coord_bary;
00263 }
00264 inline double coord_barycentrique_P1_hexaedre(const IntTab& polys,
00265                                               const DoubleTab& coord,
00266                                               double x, double y, double z,
00267                                               int le_poly, int i)
00268 {
00269   assert(polys.dimension(1)==8);
00270   double alpha_x, alpha_y, alpha_z;
00271   switch(i)
00272     {
00273     case 0 :
00274       {
00275         alpha_x = -1.;
00276         alpha_y = -1.;
00277         alpha_z = -1.;
00278         break;
00279       }
00280     case 1 :
00281       {
00282         alpha_x = 1.;
00283         alpha_y = -1.;
00284         alpha_z = -1.;
00285         break;
00286       }
00287     case 2 :
00288       {
00289         alpha_x = -1.;
00290         alpha_y = 1.;
00291         alpha_z = -1.;
00292         break;
00293       }
00294     case 3 :
00295       {
00296         alpha_x = 1.;
00297         alpha_y = 1.;
00298         alpha_z = -1.;
00299         break;
00300       }
00301     case 4 :
00302       {
00303         alpha_x = -1.;
00304         alpha_y = -1;
00305         alpha_z = 1.;
00306         break;
00307       }
00308     case 5 :
00309       {
00310         alpha_x = 1.;
00311         alpha_y = -1.;
00312         alpha_z = 1.;
00313         break;
00314       }
00315     case 6 :
00316       {
00317         alpha_x = -1.;
00318         alpha_y = 1.;
00319         alpha_z = 1.;
00320         break;
00321       }
00322     case 7 :
00323       {
00324         alpha_x = 1.;
00325         alpha_y = 1.;
00326         alpha_z = 1.;
00327         break;
00328       }
00329     default :
00330       {
00331         alpha_x = 0;
00332         alpha_y = 0;
00333         alpha_z = 0;
00334         Cerr << "Error in Champ_P1::coord_barycentrique : " << finl;
00335         Process::exit();
00336       }
00337     }
00338 
00339   int som0=polys(le_poly , 0);
00340   int som1=polys(le_poly , 1);
00341   int som2=polys(le_poly , 2);
00342   int som3=polys(le_poly , 4);
00343 
00344   double delta_x = coord(som1,0)-coord(som0,0);
00345   double delta_y = coord(som2,1)-coord(som0,1);
00346   double delta_z = coord(som3,2)-coord(som0,2);
00347 
00348   double x0 = coord(som0,0)+delta_x/2.;
00349   double y0 = coord(som0,1)+delta_y/2.;
00350   double z0 = coord(som0,2)+delta_z/2.;
00351 
00352   double coord_bary = (1./8.)*(1.+2.*alpha_x*(x-x0)/delta_x)*(1.+2.*alpha_y*(y-y0)/delta_y)*(1.+2.*alpha_z*(z-z0)/delta_z);
00353 #ifndef NDEBUG
00354   if ((coord_bary < -Objet_U::precision_geom) || (coord_bary > 1.+Objet_U::precision_geom))
00355     {
00356       Cerr << "WARNING: The barycentric coordinate of point :" << finl;
00357       Cerr << "x= " << x << " y=" << y <<" z="<< z <<finl;
00358       Cerr << "is not between 0 and 1 : " << coord_bary << finl;
00359       Cerr << "On the element " << le_poly << " of the processor " << Process::me() << finl;
00360     }
00361 #endif
00362   return coord_bary;
00363 }
